Hotel Bookings Pattern Discovery

Predicted hotel booking cancellations (Random Forest: Acc=0.867, AUC=0.925) and analyzed ADR seasonality patterns to support overbooking and revenue decisions.

PythonMachine LearningBig Data AnalyticsClassificationEDABusiness Insights
Predicting Housing Price in Taipei

Built predictive models for Taipei housing prices using linear regression, LASSO, neural networks, and random forests, achieving best RMSE ≈ 5.83 and identifying MRT proximity as the dominant driver.
